resources.string: Must contain 8 characters with at least 1 uppercase and 1 lowercase letter and either 1 number or 1 special character
Please enter an email and/or password
Make new friends from all over the world
• Express yourself through the art of letter writing.
• Create serendipitous connections with random individuals across the world.
• Every word carries the potential to change lives and bring people closer together.
Use appropriate language and avoid any form of harassment, hate speech, or explicit content. Maintain a positive and friendly atmosphere for everyone to enjoy.
Do not share personal contact information such as phone numbers, addresses, or social media handles within the app. Protect your privacy and ensure the safety of all users.
The app is meant for genuine pen pal connections and not for solicitation, advertising, or spamming. Refrain from promoting products, services, or any form of self-promotion.
Be mindful of cultural differences and avoid making derogatory or offensive comments. Embrace diversity and learn from each other\'s perspectives.
Report any instances of harassment, inappropriate behavior, or violations of the app\'s guidelines to the moderators or support team promptly.
Treat all users with respect, kindness, and empathy. Engage in conversations that promote understanding and inclusivity.
Utilize the app responsibly and within the boundaries of legal and ethical conduct. The app should be used for its intended purpose of fostering meaningful connections.
